TextBlock.Text: <color=lightblue>Enji</color>: At long last, my work has come to fruition!
There are a two things I need to take care of before it's truly complete:
1) I need to finish my work on the immense source of power for warp functionality. I'm going to prepare this at Locomocean's Refinery.

2) The coordinates leading back to my clan's <color=orange>Vessel</color> need to be updated to their current position. I'll simply drop by the <color=orange>Spruce Caboose</color> to find out where my clan is after I prepare the warp.
My two weeks are almost up. I can't wait to see the looks on their faces when I show them what I've accomplished here!
